001package fr.aumgn.dac2.game.colonnisation;
002
003import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.playerref.PlayerRef;
004import fr.aumgn.dac2.game.GamePlayer;
005import fr.aumgn.dac2.game.start.PlayerStartData;
006
007public class ColonnPlayer extends GamePlayer
008        implements Comparable<ColonnPlayer> {
009
010    private int multiplier;
011    private int score;
012
013    public ColonnPlayer(PlayerRef playerId, PlayerStartData joinData) {
014        super(playerId, joinData);
015        this.multiplier = 1;
016        this.score = 0;
017    }
018
019    @Override
020    public int compareTo(ColonnPlayer other) {
021        return new Integer(score).compareTo(other.score);
022    }
023
024    public int getScore() {
025        return score;
026    }
027
028    public int getMultiplier() {
029        return multiplier;
030    }
031
032    public void addPoints(int value) {
033        score += value;
034    }
035
036    public void incrementMultiplier() {
037        multiplier++;
038    }
039
040    public void resetMultiplier() {
041        multiplier = 1;
042    }
043}
